body:
Hello! This is another challenge by me.. (Hopefully) And ya... here it is:

LE HACKER (Stages: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

RULES: Kill a certain amount of players using the resources you have around you! (Killstreaks, No deaths whatsoever!)

Stage 1: 5 kills (Nexus, Nebula)
Stage 2: 10 kills (Nexus)
Stage 3: 20 kills (Nebula)
Stage 4: 35 kills (Nexus, Nebula,)
Stage 5: 50 kills (Nexus, Nebula, Nebula 1 hit kill maps)
Stage 6: 60 kills (Nexus)
Stage 7: 65 kills (Nebula, Nexus)
BONUS STAGE:
God: 80 kills (ALL gamemodes)

Good luck!
You have 1 week to complete any of these stages, Perferably stage 4 :)

title: Avicus Challenges  (Week 2)
